div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

p.a: Click here for the letter sent home about the coronavirus.Â

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

li.a: COVID-19: Tri County Education Plan: PK-12

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:55 am CDT

td.span: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 3pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 76. South wind 7 to 11 mph.

A 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. South wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north northwest after midnight. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
A 20 percent chance of showers after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 78. North wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the afternoon.

div.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.

input.p: Your name, phone number and email address are kept private and are for the sole use of the Tri County Public Schools site. For full details, see our privacy and security policy.
